There are thousands in America perishing in ignorance and sin. And looking afar off to some distant field, those who 
                                                                           36
know the truth are indifferently passing by the needy fields close to them. Christ says: "Go work today in My vineyard." "Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest." Matthew 21:28; 4:35.
